name: Amahle Dlamini
bio: Amahle is a versatile fashion and runway model with experience in international campaigns for top brands like Vogue and Chanel.

name: Lerato Moloi
bio: Lerato specializes in commercial and editorial modeling with a vibrant personality, featured in ads for local and global brands.

name: Zinhle Khumalo
bio: Zinhle excels in runway and fitness modeling, known for her athletic build and appearances in sports fashion shows.

name: Nandi Mabaso
bio: Nandi is a commercial and print model with a focus on beauty campaigns, having worked with cosmetics brands like MAC.

name: Thandiwe Nkosi
bio: Thandiwe specializes in fashion and beauty, with international runway experience in Milan and Paris Fashion Weeks.

name: Nosipho Zwane
bio: Nosipho is an editorial and runway model, celebrated for her unique look in high-fashion editorials.
